last_episode_to_air.name: Abby to the Rescue
last_episode_to_air.overview: Abby heads to Warwick, RI to help a struggling dance studio, but finds that the owner is missing and too anxious to even come to her own studio. With dance moms at each others' throats and a building in disrepair, will Abby be able to convince the owner to come back and take control?

name: Abby's Studio Rescue
overview: Renowned dance coach and "Dance Moms" star, Abby Lee Miller is on the road, looking to transform dance studios on the brink of disaster in the all-new series, "Abbyâ€™s Studio Rescue". Each week, the show follows Abby as she dishes her tough love and no-nonsense advice while giving dance studios a second chance to finally bring home the gold.
